description.tinkers_waste.pack: Data and resources for Tinker's Useful Items
item.tinkers_waste.seared_copper_can.too: Stackable container holding 1 brick of fluid
item.tinkers_waste.dropper.tooltip: Stackable container holding 1 nugget of fluid
item.tinkers_waste.torch.description: A tool used to light up the surrounding area.
item.tinkers_waste.small_chisel.descript: The small chisel has extremely high mining speed, but very low durability and cannot be repaired.
item.tinkers_waste.backpack.description: A tool used for storing items.
item.tinkers_waste.rod.description:
A tool used to extend your reach.
Can also be used as a staff.
item.tinkers_waste.litboard.description: An ancient tool that can be used to block attacks and illuminate the surroundings.
Provides 18 storage slots and 1 upgrade slot per level
modifier.tinkers_waste.workbench_backpac: Provides a crafting grid in the backpack's inventory
modifier.tinkers_waste.crafting_table_ba: A full table in your pocket!
Provides a full-size crafting grid in the backpack's inventory
modifier.tinkers_waste.armorization.flav: Backpacks go in the chest slot—so they're chestplates!
modifier.tinkers_waste.armorization.desc: Provides 2 defense slots and 4 armor points
Due to deliberate game design, you cannot repair this tool.
This tool cannot be repaired, please discard it
modifier.tinkers_waste.firewall.flavor: Not the one on your computer!
modifier.tinkers_waste.firewall.requirem: Firewall requires Fire Protection IV as a prerequisite
